CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1962, pg. 21 reads: "The fourth, fifth, and sixth grades of the Robert L. Vann School are to present on Friday at 7:30 P.M. in auditorium, an opereatta [sic] entitled "Four Feathers West." Pictures from the scenes are shown in the photos...Queen And Fairies - Queen Cassandra Berry and her court are shown enjoying one happy afternoon in fairyland."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fifteen girls, gathered around "Queen" Cassandra Berry on stage for performance of "Four Feathers West," Vann Elementary School
